    • 方法详细资料

      • determine

        public java.util.List<LuckyNumber> determine(Context respCtx,
                                    Magic100Ticket clientTicket)
                                      throws ApplicationException
        Determine which range of lucky numbers should be sold. LuckyNumberSequence will be used to record the next sequence number of main cycle. At the initial status, LuckyNumberSequence.nextSequence will be 1, and once sold a range, for example 1~3, the LuckyNumberSequence.nextSequence will be updated to 4, even this sale is cancelled later, the next sequence will stay as 4.

        If a sale is cancelled, the corresponding range will be saved as RequeueNumbers, and will be sold at next cycle(aims to make sure all numbers should be sold, and their prize amount should be paid as well, it is a fair game).

        Below rules must be followed:

        1. Sold requeued ranges as much as possible first, if no matched range numbers, get numbers from main cycle
        2. The numbers sold in a single request must be sequential.

        Below gives a user scenario:

        Case #1(LuckyNumberSequence.nextSequence=1)

        1. Player A requests to buy a range(countOfNumber=3).
        2. System lookup all requeued ranges by (coungOfValidNumber>=3) first, if found, use the requeued range, and mark them as invalid. If numbers are retrieved from requeued ranges, no LuckyNumberSequence.nextSequence will be updated.
        3. If no matched requeued ranges found, then lookup main cycle(beginNumber=LuckyNumberSequence.nextSequence, countOfNumber=3), and update LuckyNumberSequence.nextSequence to 4
        At a give time point, only one thread can enter this method, other threads will be blocked, otherwise different player may get same numbers in a same cycle.
        指定者:
        determine 在接口中 LuckyNumberService
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of transaction.
        clientTicket - THe client sale request.
        返回:
        the list of lucky numbers which will be sold to current player.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • cancel

        public void cancel(Context respCtx,
          Magic100Ticket ticket)
            throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: LuckyNumberService
        Cancel the sale of a set of lucky numbers. Those cancelled numbers must be requeued and can be sold for next sale request.
        指定者:
        cancel 在接口中 LuckyNumberService
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • determineNextSequence

        protected long determineNextSequence(LuckyNumber lastLuckyNumber,
                         Magic100GameInstance gameInstance)
        Determine what is the next sequence? The sequence must be in range of gameInstance.startOfSequence and gameInstance.endOfSequence
